content: **knitted christmas trees in drops lima the piece is worked bottom up theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern li-174 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** width at bottom = 9 cm height = 12 cm without trunk **yarn** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100 g colour 0705 olive 50 g colour 0100 off white 50 g colour 9024 almond + a left-over colour 2923 goldenrod for candle flames **accessories** wadding 1 tree weighs approx 8 g without wadding **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 mm **knitting gauge** 23 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
